page.title: 15JUNIOR FOOTBALL
page.content: We play football for Narborough and Littlethorpe Football club. We are a team of under10s.We play at the playing fields near the M1 bridge every Sunday between October and May. We train on Wednesdays and Saturdays in Winter. First we do some warm-ups, like jogging round the field. Then we do passing skills. We have to pass the ball to each other. Sometimes we do heading skills. That is very hard. When we are all warm we play a game. Lots of the players' brothers come to play.They nearly always win.We play for about an hour.I like to play in goal best. My friend likes to play forward. The best feeling in soccer is scoring the winner or saving a penalty. At the end of the season we each get a trophy.I will get the Golden Boot for scoring most goals.
